00009 #include "jcom.parameter.h"             // everything we need is in here
00010 #include "tt_audio_base.h"      // use the ttblue clipping functions
00011 
00012 
00013 // Attempt to limit the range of values on generic input
00014 void param_clip_generic(t_param *x)
00015 {
00016         if(x->list_size > 1)
00017                 param_clip_list(x);
00018         else if(x->atom_list[0].a_type == A_LONG)
00019                 param_clip_int(x);
00020         else if(x->atom_list[0].a_type == A_FLOAT)
00021                 param_clip_float(x);
00022 }
00023 
00024 
00025 // range limiting on int input
00026 void param_clip_int(t_param *x)
00027 {
00028         long val = atom_getlong(&x->attr_value);
00029         
00030         if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_low)
00031                 val = tt_audio_base::limit_min(val, (long)x->common.attr_range[0]);
00032         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_high)
00033                 val = tt_audio_base::limit_max(val, (long)x->common.attr_range[1]);
00034         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_both)
00035                 val = tt_audio_base::clip(val, (long)x->common.attr_range[0], (long)x->common.attr_range[1]);
00036 
00037         atom_setlong(&x->attr_value, val);      // must be set for all cases to cast the ps_none type correctly too
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 // range limiting on float input
00042 void param_clip_float(t_param *x)
00043 {
00044         float val = atom_getfloat(&x->attr_value);
00045 
00046         if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_low)
00047                 val = tt_audio_base::limit_min(val, x->common.attr_range[0]);
00048         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_high)
00049                 val = tt_audio_base::limit_max(val, x->common.attr_range[1]);
00050         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_both)
00051                 val = tt_audio_base::clip(val, x->common.attr_range[0], x->common.attr_range[1]);
00052 
00053         atom_setfloat(&x->attr_value, val);     // must be set for all cases to cast the ps_none type correctly too
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 // range limiting on list input
00058 void param_clip_list(t_param *x)
00059 {
00060         short i;
00061         
00062         for(i=0; i < x->list_size; i++){
00063                 if(x->atom_list[i].a_type == A_LONG){
00064                         if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_low)
00065                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long = tt_audio_base::limit_min(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long, (long)x->common.attr_range[0]);
00066                         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_high)
00067                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long = tt_audio_base::limit_max(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long, (long)x->common.attr_range[1]);
00068                         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_both)
00069                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long = tt_audio_base::clip(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_long, (long)x->common.attr_range[0], (long)x->common.attr_range[1]);
00070                 }
00071                 else if(x->atom_list[i].a_type == A_FLOAT){
00072                         if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_low)
00073                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float = tt_audio_base::limit_min(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float, x->common.attr_range[0]);
00074                         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_high)
00075                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float = tt_audio_base::limit_max(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float, x->common.attr_range[1]);
00076                         else if(x->common.attr_clipmode == ps_both)
00077                                 x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float = tt_audio_base::clip(x->atom_list[i].a_w.w_float, x->common.attr_range[0], x->common.attr_range[1]);                       
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 }
